variable.name: hud_frags_style
variable.description: Sets drawing style of 'teamfrags' HUD element.

value.description: Golden brackets around field with your team frags.
Arrow pointing to your own team frags field.
Red rectangle around your own team frags field.
Sets background color for your own team field to 'teamcolor'.
Sets background color for fields to teamcolors and enemycolors. Red rectangle around your own field including name and team tag.
Red rectangle around your own team field including team tag. Background color only for your own team field and set to 'teamcolor'.
Background color for whole table 50% transparent red, your own team field not transparent.
Red background color only for your own team field including team tag.
